description: Software Developer with 10+ years in the industry. Skilled in creating scalable, high-performing applications and mentoring teams to excel in delivering innovative solutions. Recognized for aligning technical expertise with business goals, and achieving impactful results.

scripts.reset-git-history: git checkout --orphan latest_branch && git add -A && git commit -am 'Initial commit' && git branch -D main && git branch -m main && git push -f origin main && git push --set-upstream origin main
